    • setNextWriteValue

      default void setNextWriteValue(T value) throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
      Updates the 'next' write value of Channel.
      Parameters:
      value - the typed value
      Throws:
      OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error

    • setNextWriteValueFromObject

      default void setNextWriteValueFromObject(Object value) throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException, IllegalArgumentException
      Updates the 'next' write value of Channel from an Object value.

      Use this method if the value is not yet in the correct Type. Otherwise use setNextWriteValue(Object) directly.

      Parameters:
      value - the value as an Object
      Throws:
      OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error
      IllegalArgumentException - on error

    • _setNextWriteValue

      @Deprecated void _setNextWriteValue(T value)
      Deprecated.
      Internal method. Do not call directly.
      Parameters:
      value - the value

    • getNextWriteValueAndReset

      default Optional<T> getNextWriteValueAndReset()
      Gets the next write value and resets it.
      Returns:
      the next write value

    • getNextWriteValue

      Optional<T> getNextWriteValue()
      Gets the next write value.
      Returns:
      the next write value; not-present if no write value had been set

    • onSetNextWrite

      void onSetNextWrite(ThrowingConsumer<T,OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException> callback)
      Add an onSetNextWrite callback. It is called when a 'next write value' was set.

      The callback can throw an OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException.

      Parameters:
      callback - the callback

    • getOnSetNextWrites

      List<ThrowingConsumer<T,OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException>> getOnSetNextWrites()
      Gets the onSetNextWrite callbacks.
      Returns:
      a List of callbacks
